about.details:
Incorporated in 2006, Rapid Fleet Management Services Limited is specializes in providing comprehensive logistics and road transportation services tailored to both B2B and B2C clients.

The company has expanded its operations significantly, currently managing a fleet of over 200 vehicles. They serve a diverse range of industries, including FMCG, automobile, and electronics sectors.

The company developed its own mobile app to streamline business processes, ensuring 24/7 operations. It focuses on client compliance through e-bidding, portal RFQs, e-POD, invoicing, and customer TMS management.

Services:

  • Full or Partial Load: The company offers Full and Partial Load services, ensuring efficient, cost-effective transport of goods and raw materials. It supports seamless logistics, timely deliveries, and flexible solutions for diverse cargo needs.
  • Exim Services: The company provides comprehensive Exim services, handling efficient customs clearance, optimized logistics, and cross-border transactions. It specializes in inland transport, connecting ports, production facilities, and ensuring timely delivery of goods.
  • Renewable Transportation Services: The company has expanded into the renewable energy logistics sector, specializing in transporting Wind Turbine Generators (WTG). It invested in extendable telescopic trailers to efficiently move large wind turbine blades.

As of August 14, 2024, the company has 68 employees on payroll.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Implementation of an integrated TMS - Digitify Book
  • In house Vehicle Fleet and its Safety for smooth operations and delivery
  • PAN India Transport
  • Pride in catering to an esteemed clientele
  • Dynamic Approach to Market Fluctuations
  • Not compromising Quality Services

faqs.question: What is the Rapid Fleet IPO?
faqs.answer:
Rapid Fleet IPO is a SME IPO of 2284800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹43.87 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹192 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on March 21, 2025, and closes on March 25, 2025.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Rapid Fleet IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Rapid Fleet IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Rapid Fleet IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Rapid Fleet IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Rapid Fleet IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Rapid Fleet IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Rapid Fleet IPO opens on March 21, 2025 and closes on March 25, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Rapid Fleet IPO?
faqs.answer: Rapid Fleet IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,15,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Rapid Fleet IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Rapid Fleet IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Rapid Fleet IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Rapid Fleet IPO will be done on Wednesday, March 26, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, March 27, 2025. Check the Rapid Fleet IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Rapid Fleet IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Rapid Fleet IPO listing date is on Friday, March 28, 2025.

reservation.summary: Rapid Fleet IPO offers total 2284800 shares. Out of which 372600 (16.31%) allocated to QIB 279600 (12.24%) allocated to NII 652200 (28.55%) allocated to RII and 558600 (24.45%) allocated to Anchor investors.

subscriptionStatus.summary: The Rapid Fleet IPO is subscribed 1.65 times on March 25 2025 6:19:59 PM (Day 3). The public issue subscribed 0.81 times in the retail category 1.07 times in the QIB category and 4.38 times in the NII category. Check Day by Day Subscription Details (Live Status)
